text: "Wait Until Tomorrow" is a song by the Jimi Hendrix Experience from their album Axis: Bold as Love. The song was written by Jimi Hendrix. The song is about a male protagonist trying to get with a girl, only to be shot dead by her father. The song was never released as a single. == Background and style == "Wait Until Tomorrow" is one of the first 'situation songs' written by Hendrix. It was influenced by soul artists such as The Isley Brothers. The song was one of the last to be recorded for Axis. == Personnel == === The Jimi Hendrix Experience === * Jimi Hendrix - lead vocal, guitars * Noel Redding - bass, backing vocals * Mitch Mitchell - drums, tambourine, backing vocals Category:1967 songs Category:Jimi Hendrix songs
